definitions.definition: the reflexive form of we; used when you and another person or other people together cause and are affected by an action

examples.text: We shouldn't blame ourselves for what happened.
Let's just relax and enjoy ourselves.
We'd like to see it for ourselves.

definitions.definition: used to emphasize we or us; sometimes used instead of these words

examples.text: We've often thought of going there ourselves.
The only people there were ourselves.

definitions.definition: for us alone to have or use; not shared with others

examples.text: We had the pool all to ourselves.
